Thanks very much.

full_threads.body:
Morning Heath,

This is very embarrassing, but I've got one more change that I should have picked up by now. I'm really sorry! Serves me right for doing the project on the run!

These 2 tables need to be adjusted please, so where it currently says 25 it should say 24, and where it currently says 34 it should now say 35. Because we've taken the brooks walnut out of stock and added into non stock.


Could you please resend all 3 copies through again when you can? Thank you, and my apologies for this.

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228
